# Zhipu AI Coding Plan

Use `zhipuai-coding-plan/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "zhipuai-coding-plan-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "zhipuai-coding-plan/glm-4.5",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `ZHIPU_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://open.bigmodel.cn/api/coding/paas/v4`

You can override the base URL by setting `ZHIPUAI_CODING_PLAN_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://docs.bigmodel.cn/cn/coding-plan/overview

- glm-4.5-flash
- glm-4.5v
- glm-4.6

</details>
